English Content:
Details from your computations are grouped and summarised in 3 categories. Select the one that applies to this asset disposal. For the purpose of this grouping only 'listed shares and securities' means any of the following:

  • shares or securities of a company listed on a recognised stock exchange throughout the period you owned them - ignoring any period when the listing or quotation was temporarily suspended - see Capital Gains Tax on GOV.UK for more information
  • shares in a company that was a UK Open-Ended Investment Company ('OEIC') throughout your period of ownership
  • units in a unit Trust that was an authorised unit trust throughout your period of ownership
Welsh Content:
Mae manylion o'ch cyfrifiannau wedi eu grwpio a'u crynhoi mewn i dri chategori. Dewiswch yr un sy'n berthnasol i'r gwarediad hwn o ased. At ddibenion y grwpio hyn mae 'cyfranddaliadau a gwarantau sydd wedi eu rhestru' yn unig yn golygu unrhyw un o'r canlynol:

  • cyfranddaliadau a gwarantau cwmni a restrwyd ar gyfnewidfa stoc adnabyddedig drwy gydol y cyfnod yr oeddech yn berchen arnynt - gan anwybyddu unrhyw gyfnod pan ohiriwyd y rhestriad neu ddyfyniad dros dro - gweler Treth Enillion Cyfalaf am fwy o wybodaeth
  • cyfranddaliadau mewn cwmni a oedd yn Gwmni Buddsoddi Penagored ('OEIC') yn y DU drwy gydol eich cyfnod o berchnogaeth
  • unedau mewn Ymddiriedolaeth Unedol a oedd yn ymddiriedolaeth unedol awdurdodedig drwy gydol eich cyfnod o berchnogaeth

English Content:
If you use your own vehicle for work, you may be able to claim 'Mileage Allowance Relief'.

To work out how much tax relief you can claim, add up your business mileage for the tax year and multiply it by the approved mileage rates.

If your employer doesn’t pay you a mileage allowance you can claim the full approved amount of Mileage Allowance Relief.

If your employer pays you a mileage allowance but it is less than the approved amount, you can claim Mileage Allowance Relief on the difference.

If your employer pays you more than the approved amount you’ll have to pay tax on the difference.
Welsh Content:
Os ydych wedi derbyn unrhyw fuddiannau a threuliau trethadwy yn sgil eich cyflogaeth gan eich cyflogwr, dewiswch 'Iawn' o'r ddewislen, fel arall, dewiswch 'Na'.

Nwyddau neu wasanaethau a ddarperir ar eich cyfer gan eich cyflogwr, ar ben y taliadau arian ar eich P60, yw buddiannau. Ad-daliadau a wneir i chi gan eich cyflogwr ar gyfer arian a wariwyd ar dreuliau yn ymwneud â'ch cyflogaeth yw treuliau.

Lwfansau cyfalaf ar gyfer cyflogeion

Mae lwfansau cyfalaf yn gostau i chi am ddarparu offer 'os yw'n angenrheidiol' er mwyn cynnal eich dyletswyddau fel cyflogai, am nad yw eich cyflogwr yn darparu'r offer. Enghreifftiau nodweddiadol o'r rhain yw offer swyddfa, megis desgiau a chypyrddau ffeilio, neu offer (tools).

Yn gyffredinol, gellir ystyried bod unrhyw beth a ddefnyddiwch wrth eich gwaith fydd yn para'n ddefnyddiol am o leiaf 2 flynedd, yn gymwys i dderbyn lwfans. Yn ogystal, mae rheolau arbennig sy'n gymwys ar gyfer offer penodol. Mae esboniad ynghylch y rhain yn nhaflen gymorth 252 o dan y pennawd 'Short-life assets'.

Caiff asedion ac offer eu hystyried yn 'angenrheidiol' os na allwch wneud eich swydd hebddynt. Mae'n rhaid iddynt fod yn bethau y byddai pob un sy'n gwneud eich swydd yn gorfod eu darparu.

Mae'r wybodaeth ar gyfer llenwi'r blychau treuliau a buddiannau isod i'w chael ar eich ffurflen P11D. Bydd eich cyflogwr yn rhoi hon i chi.

English Content:
If you've stopped working for yourself, you're taxable on any profits for the period beginning on the day after your last accounting period and the date your business ceased. You may be entitled to a tax relief called 'overlap relief'.

You must also tell us the date you stopped working for yourself. If you no longer need to pay Class 2 National Insurance contributions, we will arrange for your bills to stop.

Complete the online form - Stopping self-employment
Welsh Content:
Os ydych wedi peidio â gweithio i chi eich hun, byddwch yn agored i dreth ar unrhyw elw ar gyfer y cyfnod sy'n dechrau ar y diwrnod ar ôl i'ch cyfnod cyfrifyddu diwethaf ddod i ben ac sy'n dod i ben ar y dyddiad y peidiodd eich busnes. Efallai y bydd hawl gennych gael rhyddhad treth a elwir 'rhyddhad gorgyffwrdd' yn dibynnu ar hyd yr amser y buoch yn gweithio i chi eich hun.

Rhaid i chi hefyd ffonio'r Ganolfan Gyswllt Gymraeg (0300 200 1900) gan gadarnhau y dyddiad y gwnaethoch orffen gweithio i chi eich hun. Os nad oes bellach angen i chi dalu Cyfraniadau Yswiriant Gwladol 2, byddant yn trefnu bod eich biliau yn gorffen.

Am arweiniad a gwybodaeth bellach gweler y Nodiadau ar Hunangyflogaeth (Llawn).

English Content:
Include business income that doesn't form part of your business turnover, such as:

  • rental income from letting part of your business accommodation that has become temporarily surplus
  • payments you receive for a right to cross your land (wayleaves)

Don't include income for example, business bank interest received, if you are planning to include it elsewhere on your return.
Welsh Content:
Unrhyw incwm arall y busnes.

Dylech gynnwys incwm y busnes nad yw'n ffurfio rhan o drosiant eich busnes, er enghraifft:

  • incwm rhent o osod rhan o adeilad eich busnes nad oes ei angen dros dro
  • taliadau a gewch am hawl i groesi eich tir (fforddfraint)

Peidiwch â chynnwys incwm fel llog banc y busnes os ydych yn bwriadu ei gynnwys mewn man arall ar y Ffurflen Dreth.

Welsh Content: 33. Diwydiant adeiladu - taliadau i isgontractwyr:

English Content: You can use this worksheet to help you determine the taxable amount of premiums paid for the grant of a lease, and certain other lump sum payments and consideration, given in connection with the right to possession of a property. For leases of up to 50 years, HM Revenue & Customs treats the premium as partly capital and partly rent; only the rent element is taxable as income.
Welsh Content: Gallwch ddefnyddio'r daflen waith hon i bennu symiau trethadwy'r premiymau a dalwyd i ganiatáu prydles, a rhai cyfandaliadau eraill a chydnabyddiaeth, a roddir mewn cysylltiad â'r hawl i feddiannu eiddo. Mae Cyllid a Thollau EM yn trin y premiwm yn rhannol fel cyfalaf ac yn rhannol fel rhent ar gyfer prydlesi o hyd at 50 mlynedd. Dim ond yr elfen rhent sy'n drethadwy fel incwm. Mae'r daflen waith hon at eich defnydd chi yn unig ac ni chaiff ei hanfon at Gyllid a Thollau EM pan gyflwynir eich ffurflen dreth. Fodd bynnag, caiff gopi ei chynnwys pan fyddwch yn argraffu eich ffurflen dreth, ar gyfer eich cofnodion.

English Content: Complete an Employment page for each employment or directorship
Welsh Content: Cwblhewch dudalen Cyflogaeth ar gyfer pob Cyflogaeth neu swydd fel Cyfarwyddwr

English Content:
If you were a director of the company, select 'Yes' from the drop-down menu otherwise, select 'No'.

HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) need an 'Employment' page for each directorship, with one exception. This is where no payments of any kind (including lump sums and 'deemed payments') have been made and no benefits have been provided from that directorship. Say why you're not completing an 'Employment' page for a particular directorship in 'Any other information'.

Note - A Directorship where no payments of any kind (including lump sums and 'deemed payments') have been made and no benefits have been provided may result in HMRC deciding you no longer need to fill in a return. If you think you will receive income from this source in future tax years, you should answer 'Yes' to this question and fill in the rest of this section declaring nil income from the directorship, to save you having to re-register for Self Assessment.

You should include income received in the year to 5 April 2017 even if it was earned in an earlier year, or was paid for work not yet done, or if you have made arrangements for the income to be applied in some other way. Income is received on the earliest of the following dates. For all employees that will be:

  • the date it was due
  • the date you were entitled to be paid even if you were not paid until later
  • the date any payment on account was due or you became entitled to it and for employees who are directors
  • the date amounts were credited to you in the company's books even if you could not draw on them at that time
  • the date your earnings were decided or, if they were decided in advance, the last day of the period for which they were decided
Welsh Content:
Os oeddech yn gyfarwyddwr o'r cwmni, dewiswch 'Iawn' o'r gwymplen. Fel arall, dewiswch 'Na'.

Mae Cyllid a Thollau EM angen tudalen 'Cyflogaeth' ar gyfer pob swydd cyfarwyddwr, gydag un eithriad. Bydd hyn pan na wneir unrhyw daliadau o unrhyw fath (gan gynnwys lymp-symiau a 'thaliadau tybiedig') ac na ddarparwyd unrhyw fuddiannau o'r swydd honno. Rhowch wybod, o dan ‘Unrhyw wybodaeth arall',pam nad ydych yn llenwi tudalen 'Cyflogaeth' ar gyfer swydd cyfarwyddwr neilltuol.

Sylwer - Gall swydd fel Cyfarwyddwr, pan nad oes unrhyw daliadau (gan gynnwys cyfandaliadau a 'thaliadau tybiedig' ) wedi'u gwneud ac nad oes unrhyw fuddiannau wedi'u rhoi, arwain at Gyllid a Thollau EM yn penderfynu nad oes angen i chi lenwi ffurflen dreth bellach. Os credwch y byddwch yn derbyn incwm o'r ffynhonnell hon mewn blynyddoedd treth yn y dyfodol, dylech ateb 'Iawn' i'r cwestiwn hwn a llenwi gweddill yr adran hon, gan ddatgan dim incwm o'r swydd fel cyfarwyddwr, er mwyn eich arbed chi rhag gorfod ailgofrestru ar gyfer Hunanasesiad.

Dylech gynnwys incwm a dderbyniwyd yn y flwyddyn hyd at 5 Ebrill 2017 hyd yn oed os yr enillwyd mewn blwyddyn gynharach, neu a dalwyd am waith nad yw wedi'i wneud eto, neu os ydych wedi trefnu i'r incwm gael ei dalu mewn rhyw ddull arall. Derbynnir yr incwm ar y cyntaf o'r dyddiadau canlynol. Bydd hyn, ar gyfer pob cyflogai, fel a ganlyn:

  • y dyddiad yr oedd yn ddyledus
  • y dyddiad yr oeddech â hawl i gael eich talu hyd yn oed os na chawsoch eich talu tan yn ddiweddarach
  • y dyddiad yr oedd unrhyw daliad ar gyfrif yn ddyledus neu yr oeddech â hawl iddo ac ar gyfer cyflogeion sy'n gyfarwyddwyr
  • y dyddiad y cafodd y symiau eu credydu i chi yng nghyfrifon y cwmni hyd yn oed os na allech eu codi ar yr adeg hynny
  • y dyddiad y penderfynwyd ar eich enillion neu, os penderfynwyd arnynt ymlaen llaw, y diwrnod olaf o'r cyfnod y cawsant eu penderfynu ar ei gyfer

English Content:
Please enter the information below and click 'Add' to add another set of income details.

All entries should be in sterling.

Convert the income into UK pounds using the exchange rate at the time the income arose
Welsh Content:
Mae'n dal i fod yn rhaid i chi dalu CYG Dosbarth 2 yn ystod seibiant dros dro os ydych yn bwriadu parhau i fod yn hunangyflogedig. Mae hyn yn cynnwys:

  • ysgrifenwyr yn ymgymryd ag ymchwil
  • ar eich gwyliau
  • cyflogaeth tymor byr
  • ar wasanaeth rheithgor

Os yw'r swm CYG Dosbarth 2 yn dangos 'Ddim ar gael, gwiriwch yr help', gall hyn fod oherwydd eich bod yn ceisio llenwi eich Ffurflen Dreth rhwng 02:00 a 05:00 pan nad yw'r cyfleuster hwn ar gael.

Os ydych yn llenwi eich Ffurflen Dreth y tu allan i'r oriau hyn, cliciwch y botwm 'Ail-gyfrifo' er mwyn dangos y swm sy'n ddyledus.

Os yw 'Ddim ar gael, gwiriwch yr help' yn dal i ddangos, rhowch alwad i'r Ganolfan Cyswllt Cymraeg.

Os ydych yn meddwl bod y swm a ddangosir yn anghywir. Gallai hyn fod oherwydd y dechreuoch weithio i chi eich hun ar ôl 6 Ebrill neu y gwnaethoch roi'r gorau iddi cyn 5 Ebrill y flwyddyn dreth. Dewiswch y cysylltiad 'Diweddaru eich manylion hunangyflogaeth' er mwyn diweddaru eich cofnod.

Ar ôl gwneud newidiadau, cliciwch y botwm 'Ail-gyfrifo' er mwyn ail-gyfrifo eich CYG Dosbarth 2 os ydych wedi newid y dyddiadau y dechreuoch, neu y gwnaethoch roi'r gorau i, weithio i chi eich hun. Dylech wneud hyn hefyd os oes bylchau yn eich hunangyflogaeth pan nad oedd rhaid i chi dalu CYG Dosbarth 2.

English Content:
To avoid a potential balancing charge on a disposal, premises on which Business Premises Renovation Allowance (BPRA) has been claimed must be held for at least 7 years from the date the premises were first used or were suitable for letting. However if within that period:

  • the premises are sold or a long lease is granted for a capital sum, or
  • the premises cease to be used for business activities, or
  • the premises are demolished or destroyed, or
  • the person who incurred the renovation costs dies and the proceeds from that disposal exceed any balance of unrelieved expenditure

a balancing charge will arise.

The amount of that charge will be the relevant proceeds from the disposal event, less any residue of unrelieved expenditure (or the proceeds if that residue is nil). This amount must be entered here.
Welsh Content:
Er mwyn osgoi tâl mantoli posibl ar warediad, rhaid i adeilad y mae Lwfans Adnewyddu Eiddo Busnes (LAEB) wedi ei hawlio arno gael ei gadw am o leiaf 7 mlynedd o'r dyddiad defnyddiwyd yr adeilad am y tro cyntaf neu pan yr oedd yn addas ar gyfer ei osod. Fodd bynnag, os o fewn y cyfnod hwnnw:

  • caiff yr eiddo ei werthu neu os roddwyd ar brydles hir am swm cyfalaf, neu
  • bydd yr adeilad yn peidio â chael ei ddefnyddio ar gyfer gweithrediadau busnes, neu
  • caiff yr eiddo ei ddymchwel neu ei ddinistrio, neu
  • bu farw'r person a oedd yn gyfrifol am gostau'r adnewyddu ac mae derbyniadau o'r gwaredu hwnnw sy'n cyfeirio at y costau adnewyddu yn fwy nag unrhyw weddill o wariant heb dderbyn rhyddhad

bydd tâl mantoli yn codi.

Swm yr hyn a godir fydd y derbyniadau perthnasol o'r gwarediad llai unrhyw beth sy'n weddill o'r gwariant na chafwyd rhyddhad arno (neu'r derbyniadau os ydy'r gweddill hwnnw yn ddim). Rhaid nodi'r swm hwn yn y fan hon.

English Content:
If you received income from furnished holiday lettings in the UK, choose 'Yes' from the drop-down menu otherwise, choose 'No'.

Your property will qualify as a furnished holiday letting (FHL) as it must be in the UK or European Economic Area (EEA) and will be, for 2015 to 2016 tax year and is:

  • available for holiday letting on a commercial basis for 210 days or more during the year
  • actually let commercially as holiday accommodation for 105 days or more during the year
  • one where any periods of longer-term occupation do not exceed 155 days in the year

For further guidance and information see Helpsheet 253 - Furnished holiday lettings
Welsh Content:
Os cawsoch incwm drwy osod llety gwyliau wedi'i ddodrefnu yn y DU, dewiswch 'Iawn' o'r ddewislen, fel arall dewiswch 'Na'.

Bydd eich eiddo yn gymwys fel llety gwyliau wedi'i ddodrefnu (FHL) oherwydd ei bod yn rhaid iddo fod y DU neu yn yr Ardal Economaidd Ewropeaidd (AEE), a bydd ar gyfer y flwyddyn dreth 2016 i 2017, a'i fod:

  • ar gael fel llety gwyliau ar sail fasnachol am 210 diwrnod neu fwy yn ystod y flwyddyn, ac
  • yn cael ei osod fel llety gwyliau ar sail fasnachol mewn gwirionedd am 105 diwrnod neu fwy yn ystod y flwyddyn, ac
  • yn un lle nad yw unrhyw gyfnod o arhosiad tymor hir yn fwy na 155 diwrnod yn ystod y flwyddyn

Am arweiniad a gwybodaeth bellach, gweler Taflen Gymorth 253 - Furnished holiday lettings

English Content:
This is an amount of tax withheld on certain payments to UK residents by some European Member States and other related and third party territories under the terms of the European Savings Directive and equivalent third party agreements. This tax will be in addition to any foreign tax deducted by the country of origin of the payment.

The countries that may deduct Special Withholding Tax (SWT) are:

Andorra, Austria, Bonaire, St Eustatius and Saba, British Virgin Islands, Curacao, Gibraltar, Guernsey (up to 30/6/2011), Isle of Man (up to 30/6/2011), Jersey, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Monaco, San Marino, St Maarten, Switzerland and Turks and Caicos Islands.

Where SWT is deducted you are treated as having paid in the year of deduction an equivalent amount of Income Tax in the UK, which can be set against your UK tax liability of that year or repaid to you if the amount exceeds that liability.

Please enter the amount of any Special Withholding Tax deducted from the income. If any UK Income Tax has been deducted from the income this should also be included here and please give further details in the 'Any other information' field at the end of the 'Fill in your return' section.
Welsh Content:
Dyma swm y dreth a gaiff ei atal ar daliadau penodol i breswylwyr y DU gan rai Gwladwriaethau sy'n Aelodau o'r Undeb Ewropeaidd a thiriogaethau cysylltiedig a thiriogaethau trydydd parti eraill o dan amodau Cyfarwyddeb Cynilion Ewrop a chytundebau trydydd parti cyfwerth. Bydd y dreth hon yn ychwanegol at unrhyw dreth dramor a ddidynnir gan wlad wreiddiol y taliad.

Y gwledydd all didynnu'r Treth Ataliedig Arbennig (TAA) yw:

Andorra, Awstria, Bonaire, Cwrasao, Gibraltar, Guernsey (hyd at 30/6/2011), Jersey, Liechtenstein, Lucsembwrg, Monaco, San Marino, Y Swistir, Ynys Manaw (hyd at 30/6/2011), Ynys St Maarten, Ynysoedd St Eustatius a Saba, Ynysoedd y Turks a Caicos ac Ynysoedd y Wyryf Prydeinig.

Lle didynnir TAA rydych yn cael eich trin fel pe baech wedi, ym mlwyddyn y didyniad, wedi talu swm cyfwerth o Dreth Incwm yn y DU. Gall y swm hwn gael ei osod yn erbyn eich rhwymedigaeth Treth y DU ar gyfer y flwyddyn honno neu ei ad-dalu i chi os yw'r swm yn fwy na'r rhwymedigaeth.

Nodwch swm unrhyw Dreth Ataliedig Arbennig a ddidynnwyd o'r incwm. Os didynnwyd Treth Incwm y DU o'r incwm dylid cynnwys hwn yma hefyd. Dylech roi manylion pellach yn y blwch 'Unrhyw wybodaeth arall' ar ddiwedd yr adran 'Cwblhau eich ffurflen dreth'.

English Content:
If you run your business commercially for profit you can claim relief for the loss by reducing your income for the tax year 6 April 2016 to 5 April 2017. If the allowable loss is more than your income, you can claim the balance of the loss against your capital gains for the tax year 6 April 2016 to 5 April 2017 (you do this on your capital gains page), or against your income or your income and capital gains of the tax year 6 April 2015 to 5 April 2016.

The time limit for this claim is 31 January 2019.

The amount of loss that you can claim may be restricted.

Do not make this claim if you used cash basis.

For more information see Help Sheet 227 - Losses.
Welsh Content:
Os ydych yn rhedeg eich busnes yn fasnachol ar gyfer elw, gallwch hawlio rhyddhad ar gyfer y golled drwy ostwng eich incwm ar gyfer 2016 i 2017. Os yw'r golled ganiataol yn fwy na'ch incwm, gallwch hawlio gweddill y golled yn erbyn eich enillion cyfalaf ar gyfer 2016 i 2017 (rydych yn gwneud hyn ar eich tudalen enillion cyfalaf), neu yn erbyn eich incwm neu'ch incwm ac enillion cyfalaf ar gyfer 2014 i 2016.

Y dyddiad cau ar gyfer y cais hwn yw 31 Ionawr 2018.

Gellir cyfyngu ar swm y golled y gallwch ei hawlio.

Peidiwch â gwneud y cais hwn os gwnaethoch ddefnyddio sail arian parod.

Am ragor o wybodaeth, gweler Taflen Gymorth 227 - Losses.

English Content:
Based on the information entered in the above fields your child benefit value is shown in this box.
This has been calculated based on the child benefit allowance per week for 6 April 2016 to 5 April 2017.

Eldest or only child from 6 April 2016 £20.70
Other children from 6 April 2016 £13.70.

Child benefit is worked out by a weekly figure and multiplied by the number of weeks you received it (or the tax year if you received it for the whole of the year). The number of weeks in the year depends on how many Mondays there are.

Example 1
You have 2 children and you have received child benefit for the whole of the tax year.
£20.70 (Eldest child rate) + £13.70 (Other children rate) x 53 (number of Mondays in the year) = £1,823.20
HM revenue and customs does not include and pence and round the figure down to £1,823.00

Example 2
You have 4 children and you have received child benefit for the whole year.
£20.70 (Eldest child rate) + £13.70 x 3 (Other child rate) x 53 (number of Mondays) = £3,275.40
HM revenue and customs does not include the pence and round the figure up to £3,275.00
This value will be included in your tax calculation when determining your tax charge.
If you do not agree with these figures or you wish to provide your own, you can select ‘No’ to the question ‘If this figure is not correct, select ‘No’ and you will be given a chance to amend it below.’
You can then provide your figure in the box ‘The total amount of Child Benefit you and your partner were entitled to receive for the year to 5th April 2017.
Welsh Content: Dangosir gwerth eich budd-dal plant yn y blwch isod, yn seiliedig ar y wybodaeth a nodwyd yn y blychau uchod. Bydd y gwerth hwn yn cael ei gynnwys yn eich cyfrifiad treth wrth benderfynu'r dreth a godir arnoch.

English Content: You can use this worksheet to help you determine what you can do if you made a loss in your business. You may find it useful to summarise your loss relief claims in this worksheet. This will enable you to keep track of your losses and make sure you do not forget to claim relief for them. For detailed instructions on using this worksheet, please see the Help Sheet IR227.

Bydd hyn yn eich galluogi i gadw cofnod o'ch colledion ac i wneud yn siwr nad ydych yn anghofio gwneud cais am ryddhad ar eu cyfer. Am gyfarwyddyd manwl ar sut i ddefnyddio'r daflen waith hon, gweler y Daflen Gymorth IR227.

English Content: Delete capital gains section

English Content:
A capital gain or allowable loss may arise if you dispose of an asset which is not exempt from capital gains tax. Provide a separate computation of each gain or loss.

You will be asked later if you want to use a worksheet (which has been incorporated into these pages) to provide a computation. If you use a capital gains computation worksheet to work out the gain or loss on the disposal of an asset, the worksheet will be attached automatically to your return. If you do not use a worksheet, you will be able to attach your own computation or include it in additional information at the end of the Capital Gains section.

You can choose to use worksheets for some disposals and to perform your own computations for others.
Welsh Content:
Gall ennill neu golled cyfalaf godi os byddwch yn gwaredu ased nad yw wedi ei eithrio rhag treth enillion cyfalaf. Dylech ddarparu cyfrifiant ar wahân ar gyfer pob ennill neu golled.

Bydd gofyn i chwi'n hwyrach os ydych am ddefnyddio taflen gwaith (sydd wedi ei ymgorffori i mewn i'r tudalennau hyn) i ddarparu cyfrifiant. Os defnyddiwch daflen waith ar gyfer cyfrifo'r ennillion cyfalaf ar gyfer cyfrifo'r ennill neu'r golled wrth waredu ased, caiff y daflen waith ei hatodi'n awtomatig at eich ffurflen dreth Os na fyddwch yn defnyddio taflen waith, gallwch atodi eich cyfrifiant eich hun neu ei gynnwys yn yr adran ar gyfer gwybodaeth ychwanegol ar ddiwedd yr adran Enillion Cyfalaf.

Gallwch ddewis defnyddio taflenni gwaith ar gyfer rhai gwarediadau a pharatoi eich cyfrifiannau eich hun ar gyfer rhai eraill.

English Content:
Please enter the amount in sterling of the foreign tax paid. More information about how to calculate the correct amount of foreign tax credit relief is provided in Helpsheet 263 - Calculating foreign tax credit relief on income.

Note: if you are not resident in the UK you can't claim credit relief for foreign tax paid under a double taxation arrangement and any relief will need to be claimed in the country where you are resident.

If the tax was charged in a country where there is no double taxation arrangement in place, credit relief can only be claimed under the unilateral relief provisions if you're a resident of the United Kingdom, the Channel Islands or the Isle of Man.

If you're a resident of the United Kingdom, you can't claim credit relief for the foreign tax if you can claim exemption from that tax in the other country under any double taxation arrangements.
Welsh Content:
Nodwch swm y dreth dramor a dalwyd mewn sterling. Rhoddir rhagor o wybodaeth am sut i gyfrifo swm cywir y rhyddhad credyd treth dramor yn Nhaflen Gymorth 263 - Calculating foreign tax credit relief on income.

Sylwer: os nad ydych yn preswylio yn y DU, ni allwch hawlio rhyddhad credyd ar gyfer treth dramor a dalwyd o dan drefniant trethiant dwbl, a bydd angen hawlio unrhyw ryddhad yn y wlad lle'r ydych yn preswylio.

Os codwyd y dreth mewn gwlad lle nad oes trefniant trethiant dwbl mewn grym, gellir hawlio rhyddhad credyd o dan ddarpariaethau rhyddhad unochrog os ydych yn preswylio yn y DU, Ynysoedd y Sianel neu Ynys Manaw yn unig.

Os ydych yn preswylio yn y DU, ni allwch hawlio rhyddhad credyd treth ar gyfer y dreth dramor os gallwch hawlio eithriad rhag y dreth honno yn y wlad arall o dan unrhyw drefniadau trethiant dwbl.

English Content:
Select 'Yes' from the drop-down menu if any disposal of unlisted shares and securities is affected by a capital gains tax claim or election made in the Tax Return otherwise, select 'No'.

You must make a claim or election by clearly stating it in your attached computation. Some claims have to be made on a separate claim form which you complete and attach to your Tax Return along with your computation.

You should state the amount of any relief or allowance you are claiming and if you are claiming that any unlisted shares or securities have become of negligible value you should include as disposal proceeds for the shares the value specified in your claim.

For further guidance and information on claims and elections, please see the Capital Gains Summary Notes (PDF 127K)

To view the guidance notes you need to use a PDF file viewer. You can get one at www.adobe.com
Welsh Content:
Dewiswch 'Ydw' o'r ddewislen os effeithir ar warediad cyfranddaliadau a gwarantau nas rhestrwyd gan gais neu ddewis ar gyfer treth enillion cyfalaf a wnaed yn y Ffurflen Dreth, fel arall dewiswch 'Nac ydw'.

Rhaid gwneud cais neu ddewis trwy ddatgan hynny'n glir yn y cyfrifiant a atodir gennych. Rhaid gwneud rhai ceisiadau ar ffurflen gais ar wahân a'i atodi i'ch Ffurflen Dreth ynghyd â'ch cyfrifiant.

Dylech nodi swm unrhyw ryddhad neu lwfans rydych yn ei hawlio ac os hawliwch fod unrhyw gyfranddaliadau neu warantau nas rhestrwyd bellach â'u gwerth yn ddibwys, dylech gynnwys y gwerth a bennwyd yn eich cais ar gyfer y derbyniadau gwaredu.

Am arweiniad a gwybodaeth bellach ewch i Nodiadau Crynhoi Enillion Cyfalaf (PDF 127K)

I fwrw golwg ar y nodiadau arweiniad y mae angen i chi ddefnyddio porwr PDF. Gallwch gael un yn www.adobe.com

English Content:
Your dividend voucher will show your shares in the company, the dividend rate, the tax credit and the dividend payable. You'll get this information even if your dividends are paid direct into your bank or through your investment broker. The only figure to enter on your Tax Return is the total of all dividend payments - do not add on the tax credits.

Include all dividends from shares you acquired through employee share schemes. There is one exception and that is dividends used to buy more shares through an approved Share Incentive Plan, although you may have to include them if you take those shares out of the plan within 3 years. If you're not sure go to Employment related securities.

Dividends or distributions from UK

Real Estate Investment Trusts (UK-REITs) which are paid out of the tax-exempt profits of the UK-REIT are known as Property Income Dividends. The amount that is taxed is the full amount of the Property Income Dividend. This should go in the 'other UK income' section of the application.

Dividends from companies affected by the service company rules

If you're affected by the service company rules (you'll know if you are) and the company has made a claim for the dividends not to be taxable on you and we have approved that claim, you may exclude those dividends from your Tax Return.

Manufactured dividends

If you receive and manufacture dividends provide details in the 'Any other information' field at the end of the section, do not include the dividends here.

If you think the information you are adding has an effect on your 6 April 2017 to 5 April 2018 or 6 April 2018 to 5 April 2019 PAYE Tax codes there is guidance to tell you how to let HMRC know of the change - If you think your code is wrong.
Welsh Content:
Bydd eich taleb ddifidend yn dangos eich cyfranddaliadau yn y cwmni, y gyfradd ddifidend, y credyd treth a'r difidend sy'n daladwy. Byddwch yn cael yr wybodaeth hon hyd yn oed os telir eich difidend yn uniongyrchol i'ch cyfrif banc neu drwy eich brocer buddsoddi. Yr unig ffigur sydd angen i chi ei nodi ar eich Ffurflen Dreth yw cyfanswm yr holl daliadau difidend - peidiwch ag ychwanegu'r credydau treth.

Dylech gynnwys yr holl ddifidendau o gyfranddaliadau a gawsoch drwy gynlluniau cyfranddaliadau cyflogeion. Mae un eithriad i hyn sef difidendau a ddefnyddir i brynu rhagor o gyfranddaliadau drwy gynllun Annog Perchenogaeth Cyfranddaliadau a Gymeradwywyd, er efallai y bydd yn rhaid i chi eu cynnwys os cymerwch y cyfranddaliadau hynny allan o'r cynllun o fewn 3 blynedd. Os nad ydych yn siwr ewch i Warantau Ar Sail Cyflogaeth.

Difidendau neu ddosbarthiadau o DU

Gelwir dosbarthiadau a delir gan Ymddiriedolaethau Buddsoddi mewn Eiddo Diriaethol yn y DU (UK-REITs) allan o elw rhydd o dreth yr UK-REIT, yn Ddosbarthiadau Incwm o Eiddo (PIDs). Y swm a drethir yw swm llawn y Dosbarthiadau Incwm o Eiddo. Dylai hwn fynd yn yr adran 'Incwm arall y DU' o'r Ffurflen Dreth.

Difidendau o gwmnïau a effeithir gan y rheolau cwmnïau gwasanaeth

Os cewch eich effeithio gan reolau cwmnïau gwasanaeth (byddwch yn gwybod os yw'n berthnasol i chi) ac mae'r cwmni wedi gwneud cais fel na fydd y difidendau yn drethadwy arnoch chi ac mae CThEM wedi cymeradwyo'r cais hwnnw, gallwch hepgor y difidendau hynny o'ch ffurflen dreth. 

Difidendau a gynhyrchir

Os ydych yn derbyn difidendau a gynhyrchir rhowch fanylion yn y blwch 'Unrhyw wybodaeth arall' ar ddiwedd yr adran, peidiwch â chynnwys y difidendau yma.

English Content:
Enter the PSTR number of the pension scheme that's paying an amount of your Annual Allowance excess tax charge for 6 April 2016 to 5 April 2017. Your pension scheme administrator should give you this information.

If your overseas pension scheme is paying an amount of your Annual Allowance excess tax charge you won't have a PSTR number for that pension scheme. Instead tell HM Revenue and Customs the name and address of the scheme manager of the overseas pension scheme.

Os yw eich cynllun pensiwn tramor yn talu swm o'ch tâl treth gormodol Lwfans Blynyddol, ni fydd gennych rif PSTR ar gyfer y cynllun pensiwn hwnnw. Yn lle hynny, rowch wybod i Gyllid a Thollau EM beth yw enw a chyfeiriad rheolwr y cynllun pensiwn tramor.

Welsh Content: Dylid nodi rhywfaint o wybodaeth yn yr adran hon

English Content:
Select 'Yes' if, in the year ended 5 April 2017, you received:

  • rental income and other receipts from UK land and/or property
  • income from letting furnished holiday accommodation in the UK or European Economic Area (EEA)
  • premiums arising from leases of UK land
  • an inducement to take an interest in any property for letting (a reverse premium)

If you've been told that you're within the Managing Serious Defaulters (MSD) programme you should complete all applicable fields in the property section of the return, apportioning the figures as necessary. If you've been told that you're the subject of the additional reporting requirements you must also prepare accounts. Attach a copy of the detailed profit and loss account, balance sheet and computations for the year to 5 April 2017 with your return. Identify and explain the nature and amount of any figures contained in those accounts that can't be vouched by physical or electronic records made at the time that the underlying transactions took place, or include confirmation that no such figures are included.

If none of the above applies, select 'No'.

Further guidance and information can be found in Notes on UK property
Welsh Content:
Dewiswch 'Iawn' os yn y flwyddyn a ddaeth i ben 5 Ebrill 2017, gwnaethoch dderbyn:

  • incwm rhent a derbyniadau eraill o dir ac/neu eiddo yn y DU
  • incwm o osod llety gwyliau wedi'i ddodrefnu yn y DU neu yn yr Ardal Economaidd Ewropeaidd (EEA)
  • premiymau sy'n codi drwy brydlesu tir yn y DU
  • cymhelldal i gymryd buddiant mewn unrhyw eiddo ar gyfer ei osod (premiwm gwrthdro)

Os dywedwyd wrthych eich bod o fewn y rhaglen Rheoli Diffygdalwyr Bwriadol (MDD) dylech lenwi'r holl flychau cymwys yn adran eiddo'r ffurflen, gan ddosrannu'r ffigurau os oes angen. Os dywedwyd wrthych eich bod yn destun anghenion adrodd ychwanegol, mae'n rhaid i chi hefyd baratoi cyfrifon. Amgaewch gopi o'r cyfrif elw a cholled manwl, mantolen a'r cyfrifiannau ar gyfer y flwyddyn hyd at 5 Ebrill 2017 gyda'ch Ffurflen Dreth. Nodwch ac eglurwch nature a swm unrhyw ffigurau a gynhwysir yn y cyfrifon hynny na allant gael eu gwarantu gan gofnodion corfforol neu electronig a wnaed ar yr amser y gwnaed trafodion gwaelodol, neu cynhwyswch gadarnhad nad oes ffigurau tebyg wedi'u cynnwys.

Os nad oes un o'r uchod yn gymwys dewiswch 'Na'

Am arweiniad a gwybodaeth bellach ewch i'r Nodiadau ar Eiddo yn y DU

English Content:
Complete this field if you provided your services through a service company.

You provided your services through a service company if the following apply:

  • you performed services (intellectual, manual or a mixture of both) for a client (or clients)
  • the services were provided under a contract between the client(s) and a company of which you were, at any time during the tax year, a shareholder
  • the company's income was, at any time during the tax year, derived wholly or mainly (that is, more than half of it) from services performed by the shareholders personally.

Do not complete this field if all the income you derived from the company was employment income.
Welsh Content:
Cwblhewch y maes hwn os darparwyd eich gwasanaethau drwy gwmni gwasanaethu.

Darparwyd eich gwasanaethau drwy gwmni gwasanaethu os yw'r canlynol yn gymwys:

  • darparwyd gwasanaethau gennych (deallusol, â llaw neu gymysgedd o'r ddau) ar gyfer cleient (neu gleientiaid)
  • darparwyd y gwasanaethau dan gontract rhwng y cleient(iaid) a chwmni yr oeddech yn gyfranddaliwr ynddo ar unrhyw adeg yn ystod y flwyddyn dreth
  • roedd incwm y cwmni, ar unrhyw adeg yn ystod y flwyddyn dreth, yn deillio'n gyfan neu'n bennaf (hynny yw, dros ei hanner) o wasanaethau a gyflawnwyd yn bersonol gan y cyfranddalwyr.

Peidiwch â chwblhau'r maes hwn os mai incwm cyflogaeth oedd yr holl incwm a gawsoch o'r cwmni.

English Content:
Enter the total amount of taxable incapacity benefit before tax was taken off.

Not all Incapacity Benefit is taxable. It isn't taxable in the first 28 weeks of incapacity. It's also not taxable if your incapacity began before 13 April 1995, and Invalidity Benefit would previously have been payable.

The form P60(IB), P45(IB), P60(U) or P45(U) provided by the Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) tells you how much of your benefit is taxable. If you stopped claiming before 5 April 2017 you'll have been given either form P45(IB) Part 1A or P45 Part 1A (IB)(O). The taxable amount will be shown on either form, as will any tax taken off.

All contribution-based Employment and Support Allowance is taxable. The form P60(U) provided by the DWP tells you the taxable amount. If you stopped claiming before 5 April 2017, the taxable amount will be shown on the form P45(U) given to you when your claim ended. Tax isn't taken off the payments that you receive.
Welsh Content:
Nodwch gyfanswm y budd-dal analluogrwydd trethadwy cyn didynnu treth.

Nid yw pob Budd-dal Analluogrwydd yn drethadwy. Nid yw'n drethadwy yn y 28 wythnos gyntaf yr analluogrwydd. Nid yw'n drethadwy ychwaith os dechreuodd yr analluogrwydd cyn 13 Ebrill 1995 a phan fyddai Budd-dal Analluedd wedi bod yn daladwy yn flaenorol.

Mae'r ffurflen P60(IB), P45(IB), P60(U) neu P45(U) a ddarperir gan yr Adran Gwaith a Phensiynau (DWP) (erbyn 31 Mai 2016) yn dweud wrthych faint o'ch budd-daliadau sy'n drethadwy. Os peidioch â hawlio cyn 5 Ebrill 2016 byddwch wedi cael naill ai Ffurflen P45(IB)(Rhan 1A) neu P45(Rhan 1A)(IB)(O). Dangosir y swm trethadwy ar y naill ffurflen neu'r llall yn ogystal â'r dreth a ddidynnwyd.

Mae holl Lwfans Cyflogaeth a Chymorth yn seiliedig ar gyfraniadau yn drethadwy. Mae'r P60(U) a ddarperir gan DWP yn cadarnhau'r swm trethadwy. Os gwnaethoch stopio hawlio cyn 5 Ebrill 2016, dangosir y swm trethadwy ar y ffurflen P45(U) a roddwyd i chi pan orffennodd eich hawliad. Ni thynnir treth oddi ar y taliadau yr ydych yn eu derbyn.

English Content:
You pay tax for the tax year 6 April 2016 to 5 April 2017 according to the profits of your basis period. Once your business has been running for a couple of years, and your accounting period is established, your basis period is your accounting period.

If your business began in the year ending 5 April 2017 your basis period begins on the date you started in business and ends on 5 April 2016.

If your business began in the year ending 5 April 2016 and:

  • you've an accounting date in the year to 5 April 2017 and
    • it's more than 12 months after the date your business began, your basis period is the 12 months to that accounting date
    • it's less than 12 months after the date you started in business, your basis period is the 12 months beginning on the date you started
  • you don't have an accounting period ending in the year to 5 April 2017, your basis period is the year 6 April 2016 to 5 April 2017

If your business ceased in the year to 5 April 2017 your basis period begins on the day following your last accounting date and ends on the day your business ceased.

If you've more than one set of accounts for your basis period complete separate Self-Employment pages for each set of accounts, but only make entries in fields 'Date your basis period began' to 'Total taxable profits from this business' once, on the Self-Employment pages for the most recent set of accounts.

Enter the date your basis period began here.
Welsh Content:
Rydych yn talu treth ar gyfer 2016 i 2017 yn unol ag elw eich cyfnod sail. Unwaith y byddwch wedi bod mewn busnes am gwpl o flynyddoedd, ac mae eich cyfnod cyfrifyddu wedi ei sefydlu, eich cyfnod sail bydd eich cyfnod cyfrifyddu.

Os dechreuodd eich busnes yn y flwyddyn a ddaeth i ben 5 Ebrill 2017 bydd eich cyfnod sail yn dechrau ar y dyddiad y dechreuodd eich busnes ac yn dod i ben ar 5 Ebrill 2016.

Os dechreuodd eich busnes yn y flwyddyn a ddaeth i ben 5 Ebrill 2016 a:

  • mae gennych ddyddiad cyfrifyddu yn y flwyddyn hyd at 5 Ebrill 2017 ac
  • mae'n hwy na 12 mis ar ôl y dyddiad y dechreuodd eich busnes, eich cyfnod sail yw'r 12 mis i'r dyddiad cyfrifyddu hwnnw
  • nid oes gennych ddyddiad cyfrifyddu sy'n dod i ben yn y flwyddyn i 5 Ebrill 2017, eich cyfnod sail yw'r flwyddyn 6 Ebrill 2016 i 5 Ebrill 2017

Os daeth eich busnes i ben yn y flwyddyn i 5 Ebrill 2017 mae eich cyfnod sail yn dechrau ar y diwrnod sy'n dilyn eich dyddiad cyfrifyddu diwethaf ac yn dod i ben ar y diwrnod y daw eich busnes i ben.

Os oes gennych fwy nag un set o gyfrifon ar gyfer eich cyfnod sail, cwblhewch dudalennau Hunangyflogaeth ar wahân ar gyfer bob un set o gyfrifon, ond gwnewch gofnodion dim ond unwaith ym mlychau 'Dyddiad y dechreuodd eich cyfnod sail' i 'Cyfanswm elw trethadwy y busnes hwn', ar y tudalennau Hunangyflogaeth ar gyfer y set o gyfrifon diweddaraf.

Nodwch y dyddiad y daeth eich cyfnod sail i ben.

English Content:
The information to complete this field can be found on your P11D form, provided by your employer. See below the list of the various sections.

  • Section B box 15 - Payment made on behalf of employee
  • Section H box 15 - Interest-free and low interest loans
  • Section J box 15 - Qualifying relocation expenses payments and benefits
  • Section K box 15 - Services Supplied
  • Section M box 15 - Other items (including subscriptions and professional fees)

You will need to add together all the box 15 amounts on your P11D and enter the total figure.
Welsh Content:
Mae'r wybodaeth i lenwi'r blwch hwn i'w chael ar eich ffurflen P11D, a roddir i chi gan eich cyflogwr. Mae rhestr o'r adranau amrywiol isod:

  • Adran B blwch 15 - Taliadau a wnaed ar ran y cyflogai
  • Adran H blwch 15 – Benthyciadau di-log a benthyciadau llog isel
  • Adran J blwch 15 – Taliadau treuliau a buddiannau adleoli cymwys
  • Adran K blwch 15 – Gwasanaethau a gyflenwyd
  • Adran M blwch 15 – Eitemau eraill (gan gynnwys tanysgrifiadau a ffioedd proffesiynol)

Bydd yn rhaid i chi ychwanegu at ei gilydd yr holl symiau ym mlwch 15 ar eich P11D a rhoi'r cyfanswm.

English Content:
The foreign tax credit relief on foreign income has been calculated for you.

HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) recommend that you use this figure by selecting 'Yes' to the question 'Would you like to use this foreign tax credit relief figure'.

There are rare circumstances when changing the order in which foreign tax credit relief is calculated can produce a better result.

If you would prefer to do your own calculation, you can select 'No, calculate foreign tax credit relief manually' and HMRC will provide instructions how to do this.

If you believe a different order may produce a better result, you can select 'No, re-calculate foreign tax credit relief'.
Welsh Content:

Argymhella CThEM eich bod yn defnyddio'r ffigur hwn drwy ddewis 'Ydw' i ateb y cwestiwn 'A ydych am ddefnyddio'r ffigur hwn ar gyfer rhyddhad credyd treth dramor'.

Mae rhai amgylchiadau prin pan fydd newid trefn cyfrifo'r rhyddhad credyd treth dramor yn gallu rhoi gwell canlyniad.

Os yw'n well gennych baratoi eich cyfrifiad eich hun, dewiswch 'Nac ydw - cyfrifo'r rhyddhad credyd treth dramor â llaw. Bydd CThEM yn rhoi'r cyfarwyddiadau ynglŷn â sut i wneud hyn.

Os credwch y gallai trefn wahanol roi gwell canlyniad, dewiswch 'Nac ydw - ail-gyfrifo'r rhyddhad credyd treth dramor'

English Content:
Your dividend voucher will show your shares in the company, the dividend rate, the tax credit and the dividend payable. You will get this information even if your dividends are paid direct into your bank or through your investment broker. The only figure to enter on your Tax Return is the total of all dividend payments - do not add on the tax credits.

Include all dividends from shares you acquired through employee share schemes. There is one exception and that is dividends used to buy more shares through an approved Share Incentive Plan, although you may have to include them if you take those shares out of the plan within three years. If you are not sure go to Employment related-securities or contact your HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) office.

Dividends or distributions from UK - Real Estate Investment Trusts (UK-REITs) which are paid out of the tax-exempt profits of the UK-REIT are known as Property Income Dividends.

The amount that is taxed is the full amount of the Property Income Dividend. This should go in the 'other UK income' section of the application.

Dividends from companies affected by the service company rules

If you are affected by the service company rules (you will know if you are) and the company has made a claim for the dividends not to be taxable on you and we have approved that claim, you may exclude those dividends from your Tax Return. If you are unsure of the present position please contact your HMRC office.

Manufactured dividends

If you receive and manufacture dividends provide details in the 'Any other information' field at the end of the section, do not include the dividends here.
Welsh Content:
Bydd eich taleb ddifidend yn dangos eich cyfranddaliadau yn y cwmni, y gyfradd ddifidend, y credyd treth a'r difidend sy'n daladwy. Byddwch yn cael yr wybodaeth hon hyd yn oed os telir eich difidend yn uniongyrchol i'ch cyfrif banc neu drwy eich brocer buddsoddi. Yr unig ffigur sydd angen i chi ei nodi ar eich Ffurflen Dreth yw cyfanswm yr holl daliadau difidend - peidiwch ag ychwanegu'r credydau treth.

Dylech gynnwys yr holl ddifidendau o gyfranddaliadau a gawsoch drwy gynlluniau cyfranddaliadau cyflogeion. Mae un eithriad i hyn sef difidendau a ddefnyddir i brynu rhagor o gyfranddaliadau drwy gynllun Annog Perchenogaeth Cyfranddaliadau a Gymeradwywyd, er efallai y bydd yn rhaid i chi eu cynnwys os cymerwch y cyfranddaliadau hynny allan o'r cynllun o fewn 3 blynedd. Os nad ydych yn siwr ewch i Warantau Ar Sail Cyflogaeth.

Gelwir difidendau neu ddosbarthiadau a delir gan Ymddiriedolaethau Buddsoddi mewn Eiddo Diriaethol yn y DU (UK-REITs) allan o elw rhydd o dreth yr UK-REIT yn Ddifidendau Incwm o Eiddo.

Y swm a drethir yw swm llawn y Difidendau Incwm o Eiddo. Dylai hwn fynd yn yr adran 'Incwm arall y DU' o'r rhaglen.

Difidendau o gwmnïau a effeithir gan y rheolau cwmnïau gwasanaeth

Os cewch eich effeithio gan reolau cwmnïau gwasanaeth (byddwch yn gwybod os yw'n berthnasol i chi) ac mae'r cwmni wedi gwneud cais fel na fydd y difidendau yn drethadwy arnoch chi ac mae CThEM wedi cymeradwyo'r cais hwnnw, gallwch hepgor y difidendau hynny o'ch ffurflen dreth.

Difidendau a gynhyrchir

Os ydych yn derbyn difidendau a gynhyrchir rhowch fanylion yn y blwch 'Unrhyw wybodaeth arall' ar ddiwedd yr adran, peidiwch â chynnwys y difidendau yma

English Content:
If you received a one off lump sum payment during 6 April 2016 to 5 April 2017 from the Department for Work and Pensions (DWP), because you chose to put off or delay claiming your State Pension for at least 12 consecutive months and chose to receive during the 6 April 2016 to 5 April 2017 tax year, a one-off lump sum payment from the DWP, please enter the payment before it was taxed (the gross amount).

Note: Only enter an amount in this field if your pension was paid as a lump sum. Do not include any State Pension you have already entered in a previous field.

Sylwer: Nodwch ffigur yn y maes hwn dim ond os talwyd eich pensiwn fel cyfandaliad. Peidiwch â chynnwys unrhyw Bensiwn y Wladwriaeth rydych eisoes wedi ei gofnodi mewn maes blaenorol.

English Content:
If a relief or election has the effect that the final chargeable gain is less than the gain calculated (or the final allowable loss will be greater than that calculated), enter the amount to be deducted in your computation.

If more than one relief or election has effect enter the total amount to be deducted in arriving at the final chargeable gain or allowable loss on this disposal.

For more information on claims and elections, please see the Capital Gains Summary Notes.

Os bydd mwy nag un rhyddhad neu ddewis wedi ei hawlio, nodwch y cyfanswm i'w ddidynnu i gyfrifo'r ennill trethadwy neu’r golled ganiataol ar y gwarediad hwn.

English Content:
Please enter the gross amount of income (before any tax has been taken off) which you reported elsewhere and on which foreign tax has been paid.

Please provide details in the 'Any other information' field at the end of the 'Fill in your return' section where on your Tax Return this income is included (for example, Employment page. If more than one page, please specify which ones, for instance Self-employment, Partnership, UK Property or Capital Gains Summary pages.)

If you have a business in the UK and the gross receipts of the business include income on which you have paid foreign tax you will need to work out the amount of overall profits that came from the overseas receipts.

If the source of income is the overseas branch of a UK business, please enter the gross profits earned by the branch and keep a copy of the branch accounts as HM Revenue and Customs may ask you for a copy.

In certain circumstances if your business basis period for 2016 to 2017 overlaps with your basis period for 2015 to 2016 you may be able to claim foreign tax credit relief on the profits for the overlap period even though relief for the same tax may have already been allowed in working out your tax liability for 2015 to 2016.

For more information go to Help Sheet 260 - Overlap.
Welsh Content:
Nodwch swm gros yr incwm (cyn didynnu unrhyw dreth) a gofnodwyd gennych mewn man arall ac y talwyd treth dramor arno.

Rhowch fanylion yn y blwch 'Unrhyw wybodaeth arall' ar ddiwedd yr adran 'Cwblhau eich ffurflen dreth' lle cynhwyswyd yr incwm hwn (er enghraifft, tudalen Cyflogaeth). Os oes mwy nag un dudalen nodwch pa rai, er enghraifft Hunangyflogaeth, Partneriaeth, Eiddo DU neu tudalennau Crynhoi Enillion Cyfalaf.

Os oes gennych fusnes yn y DU ac mae derbyniadau gros y busnes yn cynnwys incwm rydych wedi talu treth dramor ar ei gyfer, bydd angen i chi gyfrifo'r elw cyflawn a ddaeth o'r derbyniadau tramor.

Os mai ffynhonnell yr incwm yw cangen dramor busnes yn y DU, nodwch yr elw gros a gafwyd gan y gangen a chadwch gopi o gyfrifon y gangen oherwydd gall CThEM ofyn i chi am gopi.

Mewn rhai amgylchiadau os ydy cyfnod eich sail busnes ar gyfer 2016 i 2017 yn gorgyffwrdd a'ch cyfnod sail ar gyfer 2014 i 2016 efallai y gallech hawlio rhyddhad credyd treth dramor ar yr elw ar gyfer y cyfnod gorgyffwrdd er y gallai rhyddhad ar gyfer yr un dreth fod wedi ei ganiatâu wrth gyfrifo eich rhwymedigaeth treth ar gyfer 2014 i 2016.

Mae Taflen Gymorth 260 - Overlap yn rhoi fwy o wybodaeth.

I fwrw golwg ar y nodiadau arweiniad y mae angen i chi ddefnyddio porwr PDF. Gallwch gael un yn www.adobe.com

English Content: You can claim foreign tax credit relief for foreign tax paid in the Foreign section of the application. You do not have to claim foreign tax credit relief, but it will usually be to your advantage to do so. Please enter the amount of foreign tax taken off income included in 'Share of taxed income taxable at 10%' for which you are not claiming tax credit relief.
Welsh Content: Gallwch hawlio rhyddhad credyd treth dramor yn adran Dramor y cais. Does dim rhaid i chi hawlio rhyddhad credyd treth dramor ond fel arfer mae'n fanteisiol i chi wneud hynny. Nodwch swm y dreth dramor a ddidynnwyd o'r incwm a gynhwyswyd yn 'Cyfran o'r incwm a drethwyd sy'n drethadwy ar 10 y cant' nad ydych yn hawlio rhyddhad credyd treth ar ei chyfer.

English Content:
If you have not used the capital gains computation worksheet to calculate the gain or loss on the disposal of an asset, you need to prepare your own computation. You will be asked to provide information from your computation to complete the Capital Gains section. The computation itself must be provided either in the additional information section at the end of the Capital Gains pages or as an attachment to your return.

If you use the computation worksheet for a disposal it will automatically be attached to your Capital Gains pages.
Welsh Content:
Os nad ydych wedi defnyddio taflen waith cyfrifo enillion cyfalaf i gyfrifo'r ennill neu'r golled wrth waredu ased bydd angen i chi baratoi eich cyfrifiant eich hun. Gofynnir i chi roi gwybodaeth o'ch cyfrifiant i gwblhau'r adran Enillion Cyfalaf. Rhaid darparu'r cyfrifiant ei hun naill ai yn yr adran ar gyfer gwybodaeth ychwanegol ar ddiwedd y tudalennau Enillion Cyfalaf neu fel atodiad i'ch ffurflen dreth.

Os defnyddiwch y daflen waith ar gyfer cyfrifo gwarediad, caiff ei atodi'n awtomatig at eich tudalennau Enillion Cyfalaf.

English Content:
Include any:

  • trade or professional journals and subscriptions and other sundry business running expenses not included elsewhere
  • net VAT payments
  • cost of protective overalls, headgear, gloves other specialised clothing

Don't include:

  • payments to clubs, charities, political parties etc
  • non-business part of any expenses
  • cost of ordinary clothing, even if bought for work

Any expenditure has to be made wholly and exclusively for your business.
Welsh Content:
Dylech gynnwys unrhyw:

  • cylchgronau masnach neu broffesiynol a thanysgrifiadau a mân dreuliau eraill i gynnal y busnes nas cynhwyswyd mewn man arall
  • taliadau TAW net
  • cost oferôls, helmedau, menig a dillad arbed arbenigol arall

Peidiwch â chynnwys:

  • taliadau i glybiau, elusennau, pleidiau gwleidyddol ac ati
  • rhan o unrhyw dreuliau nad ydyw at ddefnydd busnes
  • cost dillad cyffredin, hyd yn oed os y'u prynwyd ar gyfer busnes

Rhaid i unrhyw wariant gael ei wneud yn gyfan gwbl ac yn unig ar gyfer eich busnes.

English Content:
Most people will not need to complete these fields and if you do, you may have a tax adviser to help you.

Do not enter an amount in this field if you have not received any lump sum payments from overseas pension schemes during 2016 to 2017.

These refunds are of amounts that represent certain pension savings you made in 2015 to 2016 which was treated as non-protected pension savings under the Special Annual Allowance provisions that applied in 2015 to 2016.

Short service refunds of contributions are a different type of refund and you should enter those in the field 'Taxable short service refund of contributions (overseas pension schemes only).

For further information please view the:

  • Additional information notes
  • Help Sheet 346 - Pension savings tax charges - guidance for members of overseas pension schemes that are not UK registered pension schemes

Full guidance about all the pension savings tax charges that may arise.
Welsh Content:
Ni fydd rhaid i'r rhan fwyaf o bobl gwblhau'r blychau hyn ac, os oes rhaid i chi, gallwch gael cynghorwr treth i'ch cynorthwyo.

Peidiwch â nodi swm yn y blwch hwn os nad ydych wedi derbyn cyfandaliadau o gynlluniau pensiwn tramor yn ystod 2016 i 2017.

Mae'r ad-daliadau hyn yn symiau sy'n cynrychioli rhai cynilion o bensiwn a wnaethoch yn 2014 i 2016, a gafodd eu trin fel cynilion pensiwn heb eu hamddiffyn o dan ddarpariaethau Lwfans Blynyddol Arbennig a oedd yn gymwys yn 2014 i 2016.

Mae ad-daliadau gwasanaeth byr o gyfraniadau yn fath wahanol o ad-daliad, a dylech nodi'r rheiny yn y blwch 'Ad-daliad gwasanaeth byr trethadwy o gyfraniadau (cynlluniau pensiwn dramor yn unig)'.

Am fwy o wybodaeth gweler:

  • Nodiadau gwybodaeth ychwanegol
  • Taflen Gymorth 346 - Taliadau treth cynilion pensiwn - arweiniad ar gyfer aelodau o gynlluniau pensiwn dramor nad ydynt yn gynlluniau pensiynau cofrestredig yn y DU

Mae arweiniad llawn ar yr holl daliadau treth cynilion pensiwn a all godi ar gael yn www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/rpsmmanual/index.htm

I edrych ar y nodiadau a'r Taflenni Cymorth bydd angen i chi ddefnyddio adolygydd ffeiliau fel Adobe Reader neu Acrobat Exchange gan Adobe Systems Incorporated i edrych ar y dogfennau hyn. Os nad oes gennych feddalwedd ar gyfer gweld PDF, gallwch ei gael o'u gwefan yn www.adobe.com

English Content:
Select 'Yes' from the drop-down menu if any disposal of property or other assets is affected by a capital gains tax claim or election made in the Tax Return otherwise, select 'No'.

You must make a claim or election by clearly stating it in your attached computation. Some claims have to be made on a separate claim form which you complete and attach to your Tax Return along with your computation.

You should state the amount of any relief or allowance you are claiming and if you are claiming that any property or other asset has become of negligible value you should include as disposal proceeds for the asset the value specified in your claim.
Welsh Content:
Dewiswch 'Ydw' o'r ddewislen os effeithir ar warediad eiddo neu asedion eraill gan gais neu ddewis ar gyfer treth enillion cyfalaf a wnaed yn y Ffurflen Dreth, fel arall dewiswch 'Nac ydw'.

Rhaid gwneud cais neu ddewis trwy ddatgan hynny'n glir yn y cyfrifiant a atodir gennych. Rhaid gwneud rhai ceisiadau ar ffurflen gais ar wahân a'i atodi i'ch Ffurflen Dreth ynghyd â'ch cyfrifiant.

Dylech nodi swm unrhyw ryddhad neu lwfans rydych yn ei hawlio ac os hawliwch fod unrhyw eiddo neu ased arall bellach â'i werth yn ddibwys, dylech gynnwys y gwerth a bennwyd yn eich cais fel y derbyniadau gwaredu ar gyfer yr ased.

English Content:
You can claim the cost of replacing domestic items in the residential accommodation where:

  • the cost is incurred on purchasing a replacement domestic item – you can’t claim the initial cost for an item provided for use in the accommodation for the first time
  • the new item is provided solely for the use of the tenants in the accommodation and the old item is no longer available for use - If the new item is an improvement on the old item, you can only claim up to the amount needed to replace the original item

include items such as:

  • moveable furniture for example, beds, free-standing wardrobes
  • furnishings for example, curtains, linens, carpets, floor coverings
  • household appliances for example, televisions, fridges, freezers
  • kitchenware for example, crockery, cutlery
Welsh Content:
Os ydych yn gosod unrhyw lety preswyl wedi'i ddodrefnu (ar wahân i 'lety gwyliau wedi'i ddodrefnu'), yna ni allwch wneud cais am lwfansau cyfalaf ar gyfer unrhyw beiriannau, dodrefn neu ddeunyddiau a gyflenwir, nac unrhyw osodiadau sy'n rhan o'r anhedd-dŷ. Yn lle hynny, gallwch wneud cais am y lwfans traul 10%. Nid yw'r lwfans adnewyddu ar gyfer y gost o amnewid eitemau dodrefnu a pheirianwaith bellach ar gael ar ôl y flwyddyn dreth 2012 i 2013.

Mae'r lwfans traul yn 10% o'r rhenti net ar ôl didynnu taliadau neu wasanaethau sydd fel arfer yn cael eu dwyn gan denant, ond sydd, mewn gwirionedd, yn cael eu dwyn gennych chi (fel y Dreth Gyngor).

English Content:
Select the check box if you received any Interest and other income from overseas savings.

This includes:

  • interest from foreign bank accounts, foreign company loan stocks, or from loans to individuals or other organisations outside the UK
  • interest from overseas unit trusts and other investment funds - your unit trust or fund voucher will show the interest paid and any foreign tax or Special Withholding Tax paid, ask the administrator of the trust or fund for a voucher if you don't have one
  • income from a purchased life annuity - Income will only be part of the payment you receive, check your payment certificate or other advice from your annuity payer, don't put the rest of the payment on your Tax Return. A purchased life annuity is not a retirement annuity, nor the result of contributions made to a personal pension plan
  • 'reported income' from offshore funds - this is income arising from investments in offshore funds that hasn't been paid to you but which has instead been accumulated on your behalf; reported income is taxable even though you haven't received it, and must be included in your return
  • any other income from overseas savings
  • accrued income securities including all interest bearing securities - no profit arises and no loss is made for 6 April 2016 to 5 April 2017 if the nominal value of all accrued income securities held at any time in 6 April 2016 to 5 April 2017 and 6 April 2017 to 5 April 2018 didn't exceed £5,000, If the value is above £5,000 you'll have to calculate profits or losses.

More information available in Help sheet 343 - Accrued Income Scheme
Welsh Content:
Dewiswch y blwch gwirio os cawsoch unrhyw log ac incwm arall o gynilion tramor.

Mae hwn yn cynnwys:

  • Llog o gyfrifon banc tramor, stociau benthyg cwmni tramor, neu o fenthyciadau i unigolion neu gyrff eraill y tu allan i'r DU
  • Llog o ymddiriedaethau uned a chronfeydd buddsoddi eraill. Bydd y daleb a gewch o'r ymddiriedaeth uned neu'r gronfa yn dangos y llog a dalwyd ac unrhyw dreth dramor neu Dreth Ataliedig Arbennig a dalwyd. Gofynnwch weinyddwr yr ymddiriedolaeth neu'r gronfa am daleb os nad oes gennych un
  • Incwm o flwydd-dal bywyd a brynwyd. Dim ond rhan o'r taliad a gewch yw'r incwm - gwiriwch eich tystysgrif ar gyfer y taliad neu unrhyw hysbysiad arall a gewch gan dalwr y blwydd-dal. Peidiwch â rhoi gweddill y taliad ar eich Ffurflen Dreth. Nid yw blwydd-dal bywyd a brynwyd yn flwydd-dal ymddeol, nac ychwaith yn ganlyniad o gyfraniadau a dalwyd i gynllun pensiwn personol
  • Dosbarthiadau ac 'incwm dynodedig' o gronfeydd alltraeth. Incwm dynodedig yw incwm sy'n codi o fuddsoddiadau mewn cronfeydd alltraeth sydd heb ei dalu i chi ond sydd yn hytrach wedi ei gronnu ar eich rhan. Mae incwm dynodedig yn drethadwy hyd yn oed os nad ydych wedi ei dderbyn, a rhaid i chi ei gynnwys ar eich ffurflen dreth
  • Unrhyw incwm arall o gynilion tramor
  • Gwarantau incwm cronedig gan gynnwys yr holl warantau sy'n dwyn llog. Ni fydd elw'n codi ac ni wneir colled ar gyfer 2016 i 2017 os nad oedd gwerth nominal yr holl warantau incwm cronedig ar unrhyw adeg yn 2016 i 2017 a 2017 i 2017 yn uwch na £5,000. Os ydy'r gwerth yn uwch na £5,000 bydd yn rhaid i chi gyfrifo'r elw neu'r colledion. Mae taflen gymorth 342 yn rhoi fwy o wybodaeth

Taflen gymorth 343 - Accrued Income Scheme

English Content:
Please enter the amount, in sterling, of the foreign tax paid on the income entered in the 'Amount of income arising or received before any tax taken off' field. More information about how to calculate the correct amount foreign tax credit relief is provided in Helpsheet 263 Calculating foreign tax credit relief on income (PDF 110K) provides further information.

To view the guidance notes you need to use a PDF file viewer. You can get one at www.adobe.com

Please note that if you are not resident in the UK you cannot claim credit relief for foreign tax paid under a double taxation arrangement and any relief will need to be claimed in the country where you are resident.

If the tax was charged in a country where there is no double taxation arrangement in place, credit relief can only be claimed under the unilateral relief provisions if you are a resident of the United Kingdom, the Channel Islands or the Isle of Man.

If you are a resident of the United Kingdom, you cannot claim credit relief for the foreign tax if you can claim exemption from that tax in the other country under any double taxation arrangements.
Welsh Content:
Nodwch mewn sterling, swm y dreth dramor a dalwyd ar yr incwm a nodwyd yn y blwch 'Swm yr incwm sy'n codi neu a dderbyniwyd cyn didynnu unrhyw dreth'

Ceir rhagor o wybodaeth ynglŷn â sut i gyfrifo'r rhyddhad credyd treth dramor cywir yn Nhaflen Gymorth 263 - Calculating foreign tax credit relief on income (2011) (PDF)

I fwrw golwg ar y nodiadau arweiniad y mae angen i chi ddefnyddio porwr PDF. Gallwch gael un yn www.adobe.com

Sylwer os nad ydych yn preswylio yn y Deyrnas Unedig ni allwch hawlio rhyddhad credyd ar gyfer treth dramor a delir o dan drefniant trethiant dwbl a bydd angen hawlio unrhyw ryddhad yn y wlad lle rydych yn preswylio.

Os codwyd y dreth mewn gwlad lle nad oes trefniant trethiant dwbl mewn grym, gellir hawlio rhyddhad credyd o dan ddarpariaethau rhyddhad unochrog os ydych yn preswylio yn y Deyrnas Unedig, Ynysoedd y Sianel neu Ynys Manaw yn unig.

Os ydych yn preswylio yn y Deyrnas Unedig, ni allwch hawlio rhyddhad credyd treth ar gyfer y dreth dramor os gallwch hawlio eithriad rhag y dreth honno yn y wlad arall o dan unrhyw drefniadau trethiant dwbl.

English Content:
You will need Help Sheet 211 Employment - residence and domicile issues to work out the part of your income and receipts which is not liable to UK Income Tax in the year to 5 April 2017 if:

  • you're claiming remittance basis, will be or have been, claiming non UK residence, non UK domicile or split-year treatment
  • you received income in a foreign country that you couldn't bring to this country because of exchange controls or a shortage of foreign currency in that country

Enter the amount not liable this year. However, you may have tax to pay on this amount (or part of it) in an earlier or later year or tax may be payable in another country on the same amount.
Welsh Content:
Bydd angen Taflen Gymorth 211 - Employment - Residence and domicile issues (PDF 108K)arnoch i gyfrifo rhan eich incwm a'ch derbyniadau nad yw'n agored i Dreth Incwm y DU yn y flwyddyn hyd at 5 Ebrill 2017 os:

  • ydych neu os byddwch neu os buoch yn hawlio nad ydych yn preswylio, fel arfer yn preswylio neu nad yw eich domisil yn y DU neu'n hawlio triniaeth blwyddyn ranedig
  • derbynioch incwm mewn gwlad dramor na allech ei drosglwyddo i'r wlad hon oherwydd rheolaeth gyfnewid neu brinder arian cyfred tramor yn y wlad honno

English Content:
If you're a subcontractor in the construction industry, enter the total deductions made by your contractors from payments you received in the year 6 April 2016 to 5 April 2017. The deductions are shown on payment and deduction statements that your contractors should have given you. Don't send these with your tax return. Even if you have already claimed a repayment of your Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) deductions, you should enter the total deductions made during the year.

(Enter in the field 'Income Tax refunded or set-off' in the 'Tax refunded or set-off' section of the return, the amount of repayment received or set off against other tax due.)

If you make an entry here, don't forget to include in your 'turnover' your gross receipts from all contractors (the full amount of the payments you received before taking off the CIS deductions).
Welsh Content:
Os ydych yn isgontractiwr yn y diwydiant adeiladu, nodwch gyfanswm y didyniadau a wnaed gan eich contractwyr o daliadau a dderbynioch yn y flwyddyn 6 Ebrill 2016 hyd at 5 Ebrill 2017. Dangosir y didyniadau ar eich datganiadau tâl a didyniadau dylai eich contractwyr fod wedi eu rhoi i chi. Peidiwch ag anfon y rhain gyda'ch ffurflen dreth. Dylech nodi cyfanswm y didyniadau Cynllun y Diwydiant Adeiladu (CIS) a wnaed yn ystod y flwyddyn, hyd yn oed os ydych wedi gwneud cais am ad-daliad ar eu cyfer.

Nodwch yn y blwch 'Treth Incwm a ad-dalwyd neu a wrthbwyswyd' yn adran 'Treth a ad-dalwyd neu a wrthbwyswyd' y ffurflen dreth, swm yr ad-daliad a dderbyniwyd neu a wrthbwyswyd yn erbyn treth arall sy'n ddyledus.

Os ydych yn gwneud cofnod yma, peidiwch ag anghofio i gynnwys yn eich 'trosiant' eich derbynebau gros oddi wrth bob contractwr (hynny yw, swm llawn y taliadau y derbyniwyd gennych cyn tynnu'r didyniadau CIS).

English Content:
If you choose 'yes' from the drop down menu, you'll be asked to choose a % rate of relief that is the foreign tax deducted that you want to set against your liability to UK tax on that same income.

Foreign Tax Credit Relief isn't always available, or may not be available on the full amount of foreign tax you've paid. Relief is subject to the following rules:

  1. You must be a UK resident.
  2. The income must arise in the foreign country and be properly chargeable under the foreign country's law.
  3. The amount of Foreign Tax Credit Relief mustn't exceed the UK tax on the same item of income or gains where a Double Taxation Agreement exists between the UK and the other country, the amount of foreign tax available for the relief is restricted to the minimum foreign tax payable under the terms of the Agreement.

If a double taxation agreement does exist check what it says and how it applies to you. If foreign tax credit relief can't be claimed for some or all of the foreign tax you'll have to consider making a claim to the tax authority of the other country. You can find information about this claims process in the Double Taxation Relief Manual

If no Double Taxation Agreement exists, or the Agreement does not cover that particular foreign tax, relief is only available if the tax corresponds to UK Income or Capital Gains Tax.

Helpsheet 263 - Calculating foreign tax credit relief on income gives further information about foreign tax credit relief.
Welsh Content:
Os dewiswch 'Iawn' o'r ddewislen, gofynnir i chi ddewis cyfradd ganrannol o ryddhad sef y dreth dramor a ddidynnwyd yr ydych am ei gwrthbwyso yn erbyn eich rhwymedigaeth i dreth y DU ar yr un incwm.

Nid yw Rhyddhad Credyd Treth Dramor ar gael bob tro, neu efallai na fydd ar gael ar y swm llawn o dreth dramor yr ydych wedi'i dalu. Mae rhyddhad yn amodol ar y rheolau canlynol:

  1. Mae'n rhaid eich bod yn preswylio yn y DU
  2. Mae'n rhaid i'r incwm ddod o wlad dramor, a bod yn briodol i'w drethu o dan gyfraith y wlad dramor
  3. Ni ddylai swm y Rhyddhad Credyd Treth Dramor fod yn uwch na threth y DU ar yr un eitem o incwm neu enillion pan fo Cytundeb Trethiant Dwbl yn bodoli rhwng y DU a'r wlad arall. Mae swm y dreth dramor sydd ar gael ar gyfer y rhyddhad yn cael ei chyfyngu i isafswm y dreth dramor sy'n daladwy o dan delerau'r Cytundeb

Os oes Cytundeb Trethiant Dwbl yn bodoli, gwiriwch yr hyn y mae'n ei ddweud a sut y mae'n berthnasol i chi. Os na ellir hawlio Rhyddhad Credyd Treth Dramor ar gyfer rhan o'r dreth dramor, neu'r dreth dramor gyfan, bydd yn rhaid i chi ystyried gwneud cais i awdurdod treth y wlad arall. Ceir gwybodaeth am y broses hon o wneud ceisiadau yn y Double Taxation Relief Manual

Os nad oes Cytundeb Trethiant Dwbl yn bodoli, neu os nad yw'r Cytundeb yn cwmpasu'r dreth dramor benodol honno, dim ond os yw'r dreth yn cyfateb â Threth Enillion Cyfalaf neu Dreth Incwm y DU y mae rhyddhad ar gael.

Gweler Taflen Gymorth 263 - Calculating foreign tax credit relief on income am ragor o wybodaeth ynglŷn â rhyddhad credyd treth dramor.

English Content:
Living accommodation is any accommodation that you can live in, whether you live there all the time or only occasionally. It includes houses, flats, houseboats, holiday homes and apartments.

Living accommodation doesn't include hotel rooms or board and lodgings, where you're dependent on someone else for cooking, cleaning or laundry, etc.

Your income from employment should include the value of any living accommodation you or your relations get by reason of your employment. That value is made up of a basic calculation, with an additional calculation if the accommodation cost more than £75,000.

The information you need to complete this field can be found on your P11D (Expenses and Benefits) form, provided by your employer.

For accommodation provided by your employer, enter any figure shown at section D, box 14 of your P11D.

If you think all or part of this amount should be exempt from tax refer to HS202 Living accommodation and follow the working sheet.
Welsh Content:
Unrhyw lety y gallwch fyw ynddo yw 'llety', p'un a'ch bod yn byw yno'n barhaol neu ar brydiau'n unig. Mae'n cynnwys tai, fflatiau, cychod preswyl, tai gwyliau a rhandai.

Nid yw llety yn cynnwys ystafelloedd mewn gwestai neu letyau â phrydiau, pan fyddwch yn ddibynnol ar rywun arall ar gyfer coginio, glanhau neu olchi dillad, etc.

Dylai eich incwm cyflogaeth gynnwys gwerth unrhyw lety rydych chi neu eich perthnasau yn ei gael yn sgil eich cyflogaeth. Mae'r gwerth hwnnw yn cynnwys cyfrifiad sylfaenol, gyda chyfrifiad ychwanegol os yw'r llety'n costio mwy na £75,000.

Mae'r wybodaeth sydd angen arnoch er mwyn llenwi'r blwch hwn i'w chael ar eich ffurflen P11D (Treuliau a Buddiannau), a roddir i chi gan eich cyflogwr.

Ar gyfer llety a roddwyd gan eich cyflogwr, nodwch unrhyw ffigur a ddangosir yn adran D, blwch 14 eich P11D.

Os ydych yn credu y dylai'r swm cyfan neu ran ohono fod wedi ei eithrio rhag treth, dylech gyfeirio at HS202 Living accommodation a dilyn y daflen waith.

English Content:
Income Contingent Repayment (ICR) Student Loans are collected by HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) (for new borrowers, from August 1998). You will have received a letter from the Student Loans Company (SLC) before you were due to start repaying your loan telling you the date from which any ICR loan repayments will become due.

If you have an ICR Student Loan for which repayment began before 6 April 2017, select 'Yes', from the drop-down menu otherwise select 'No'.

From 6 April 2016 there will be two income thresholds, know as plan 01 and plan 02. The existing (or plan 01) threshold will rise from £17,335 to £17,495. If your deductions are based on plan 01 and you earn less than £17,495 you won’t have to make any repayments.. If your deductions are based on plan 02 and you earn less than £21,000 you won’t have to make any repayments. Student Loan repayments are then collected at a rate of 9% on any income over these limits.

You will be asked to confirm your Student Loan status. Student Loan repayments are then worked out as described above along with any tax and National Insurance contributions. Self Assessment Student Loan repayments are due to be paid by 31 January following the year of assessment. This means that they will be included in your 31 January balancing payment each year. They are not included in the Self Assessment payment-on-account figures calculated during the year.

Contact HMRC if any of the following apply:

  • you receive notification after you have sent your return that your ICR student loan has been fully repaid before 1 January 2018
  • you feel that our calculation of your student loan repayment will exceed the balance remaining on your loan - go to Collection of Student Loans for Self Assessment (SA) customers for more information

If you haven't received notification that your loan has been fully repaid but you think that you're nearing the end of your loan term you should contact the SLC direct. Contact details are on the Student Loan Repayment website.
Welsh Content:
Caiff Ad-daliadau Benthyciadau Myfyrwyr sy’n Amodol ar Incwm (ICR) eu casglu gan Gyllid a Thollau EM (CThEM) (ar gyfer benthycwyr newydd, o fis Awst 1998). Byddwch wedi derbyn llythyr oddi wrth y Cwmni Benthyciadau Myfyrwyr (SLC) cyn i chi ddechrau ad-dalu eich benthyciad yn rhoi gwybod i chi o ba ddyddiad y bydd ad-daliadau benthychiadau ICR yn ddyledus.

Os yw ein cofnodion yn dangos bod gennych Fenthyciad Myfyriwr sy'n Amodol ar Incwm (ICR) y dechreuodd ad-daliadau ar ei gyfer cyn 6 Ebrill 2017, dewiswch 'Iawn' o'r ddewislen neu fel arall dewiswch 'Na'.

Seilir ad-daliadau benthyciad ICR ar eich incwm ac nid ar y swm a fenthycwyd. Dyma sy'n gwneud y benthyciad yn un sy'n 'amodol ar incwm'.

Yn ychwanegol at hyn daw ad-daliadau'n ddyledus dim ond pan fydd eich incwm yn mynd yn uwch na'r trothwy blynyddol (sef £17,335 ar hyn o bryd).

Cysylltwch â CThEM os yw unrhyw un o'r canlynol yn berthnasol:

  • cewch hysbysiad ar ôl i chi ddychwelyd eich ffurflen dreth sy'n nodi eich bod wedi ad-dalu eich benthyciad myfyriwr ICR yn llawn cyn 1 Ionawr 2017.
  • rydych yn teimlo y bydd ein cyfrifiad o'ch ad-daliad benthyciad myfyriwr yn fwy na'r hyn sy'n weddill o'ch benthyciad – ewch i Casglu Benthyciadau Myfyrwyr ar gyfer cwsmeriaid Hunanasesiad am ragor o wybodaeth.

Os na chawsoch eich hysbysu fod eich benthyciad wedi ei ad-dalu’n llawn ond credwch eich bod yn dod at ddiwedd cyfnod eich benthyciad, dylech gysylltu’n uniongyrchol â’r Cwmni Benthyciadau Myfyrwyr. Mae’r manylion cyswllt ar eu gwefan yn:

www.studentloanrepayment.co.uk
